job.title: Data Scientist - Machine Learning
job.description: Amazon’s location and predictive routing inputs play a crucial role in our vehicle routing problems and other critical applications for Amazon , Prime Now, and other Amazon businesses. As part of the Last Mile Science & Technology organization, you’ll partner closely with other scientists and engineers in a collegial environment with a clear path to business impact. We have an exciting problem area to improve the maps, geocodes, and routing inputs used in Last Mile planning and navigation by leveraging machine learning and deep learning techniques, and are actively looking to hire scientists to lead this area. Successful candidates will have breadth in applying machine learning to solve industry problems, the ability to map models into production-worthy code, the communication skills necessary to explain complex technical approaches to a variety of stakeholders and customers, and the excitement to take iterative approaches to tackle big, long term problems. #lastmile Amazon is an Equal Opportunity-Affirmative Action Employer - Female/Minority/Disability/Veteran/Gender Identity/Sexual Orientation - Amazon.com Services LLC Job ID: A1608408
